title: App Alert
text: Warning: There is a bug in this version of the application and our team is working quickly to resolve it.

title: New Hymn Books Coming Soon
text: We'd like to thank you for using HymnTracker. There are some changes coming to the hymn books starting next month and rolling out over the next few years. So, stay tuned for updates to the app.

title: Event Planner
text: Welcome to Event Tracker, where organizing your most cherished events becomes effortless. Whether it's birthdays, anniversaries, or special gatherings, our app is here to simplify the process. We're thrilled you've chosen us to be a part of your event planning journey. Should you encounter any questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Let's make every moment memorable, together!
